newsitem.title: UK: Algeria tenders to buy cargo white sugar - traders.
newsitem.headline: Algeria tenders to buy cargo white sugar - traders.

text.p: Algeria is in the market on Wednesday to buy one cargo of 45 ICUMSA white sugar, most likely for prompt arrival, traders said.
"I suspect they may be able to get prompt arrival," said one trader, adding that availability was currently sufficient in the Mediterranean to ensure supply.

Algeria was reported to have tendered over last weekend to buy between 12,000 and 14,000 tonnes of lesser-quality 100 or 150 ICUMSA sugars for October 10/20 delivery but traders said no deal had so far been struck.
